attributes.action: Make it illegal to smoke in the street while with under 16 year old children
attributes.background: I am a father who regularly takes my children to school or out to the town centre and the number of people smoking while pushing children in prams or young children walking next to them. breathing  in the smoke as they have no choice but be right near the adult smoking

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure whether you'd like to ban people from smoking near children or ban people with children from smoking in public. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you would like to ban cigarette smoking in public areas, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200253
